    • Method Detail

      • selectLocal

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Selector selectLocal(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource subject)
        Select all triples that are "local" to the given subject.

        Given a URI, "local" triples include those who have a subject that:

        • is the URI
        • Has a 'hash' relationship to the URI (e.g. http://example.org/x and http://example.org/x#foo)
        • is a blank node traversable by the URI or any related hash URIs
        Parameters:
        subject - a resource that is the Subject of at least one statement.
        Returns:
        Selector that selects all local triples with respect to the subject.

      • cut

        public static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model cut(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model from,
                                                  org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Selector selector)
        Remove a subset of a Model with the given Selector.
        Parameters:
        from - Model that will have statements removed
        selector - Selector for matching statements to remove
        Returns:
        a Model containing all the extracted triples.

      • determineSerialization

        public static org.apache.jena.riot.RDFFormat determineSerialization(PackageGenerationParameters params,
                                                                    org.apache.jena.riot.RDFFormat defaultFormat)
        Determines the preferred serialization for RDF-based package resources. This method consults the supplied PackageGenerationParameters for a preferred format. A default RDFFormat may be supplied, which will be returned if the preferred serialization cannot be determined. The default format may be null, which is interpreted as RDFFormat#TURTLE_PRETTY.
        Parameters:
        params - the package generation parameters
        defaultFormat - the default format to use, may be null
        Returns:
        the RDFFormat to use when serializing package resources
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied params are null
